name: Bank
description: Decentralized Bank. The main Bank contract for banking operations. You use this contract for banking operations.

eventDecorators.name: ApproveOrRejectLoan
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when Manager approve or reject loan.

parameterDecorators.name: status
parameterDecorators.description: Loan status, if `true` then loan approved else if `false` then loan rejected.

eventDecorators.name: CancelLoanRequest
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User cancel Loan request.

eventDecorators.name: CreateAccount
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when a new user is added.

eventDecorators.name: Deposit
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User deposits to his/her account.

eventDecorators.name: DepositEthToBank
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when Owner deposits Eth to the Bank.

eventDecorators.name: FixedDeposit
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User deposits an amount for a fixed duration.

eventDecorators.name: IncreaseReserveBalance
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when Owner increases reserve balance.

eventDecorators.name: LoanClosed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when Loan is closed.

eventDecorators.name: LoanDeadLineCrosssed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User failed to repay loan.

eventDecorators.name: OwnerWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when Owner withdraws profit.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed.

eventDecorators.name: PausedNewDeposits
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when new deposits are freezed.

eventDecorators.name: PausedNewLoans
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when new loans are freezed.

eventDecorators.name: RemoveFDDurationAndInterest
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when Manager remove a fixed deposit duration and its interest rate.

eventDecorators.name: RemoveLoanDurationAndInterest
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when Manager remove a loan duration and its interest rate.

eventDecorators.name: RepayLoan
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User repays the loan.

eventDecorators.name: RequestLoan
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User requests for a loan.

eventDecorators.name: ResumedNewDeposits
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when allows new deposits.

eventDecorators.name: ResumedNewLoans
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when new loans are available.

eventDecorators.name: SetFDDurationAndInterest
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when Manager sets a Fixed deposit duration and its interest rate.

eventDecorators.name: SetLoanDurationAndInterest
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when Manager sets a loan duration and its interest rate.

eventDecorators.name: SetManager
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when Owner changes the manager.

eventDecorators.name: Withdraw
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User withdraws from his/her account.

eventDecorators.name: WithdrawFD
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User withdraws his/her fixed deposit.

eventDecorators.name: WithdrawFDBeforeMaturity
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when implementation is changed. Emitted when User withdraws his/her fixed deposit before maturity period.

functionDecorators.name: approveOrRejectLoan
functionDecorators.description: Approve or reject loan. Manager approve or reject loan.

parameterDecorators.name: _approve
parameterDecorators.description: `true` value indicates the approval and `false` indicates rejection.

functionDecorators.name: cancelLoanRequest
functionDecorators.description: Cancel Loan Request. User cancels requested loan.

parameterDecorators.name: _cancelLoanId
parameterDecorators.description: id of the loan to be cancelled.

functionDecorators.name: deadLineCrossed
functionDecorators.description: Change Loan status to deadline crossed. Change Loan status to deadline crossed.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Send eth to deposit it in the account. User deposits to his/her account.

functionDecorators.name: depositEthToBank
functionDecorators.description: Deposits Eth to the Bank. Owner deposits Eth to the Bank.

functionDecorators.name: fixedDeposit
functionDecorators.description: Send fixed deposit amount in Eth and choose a tariff. User deposits an amount for a fixed duration.

functionDecorators.name: getAllUsers
functionDecorators.description: Manager can get addresses of all Users. Manager can get addresses of all Users.

functionDecorators.name: getFDDurationAndInterest
functionDecorators.description: Get all fixed deposit durations and their interest rates. Get all fixed deposit durations and their interest rates.

parameterDecorators.name: _cursor
parameterDecorators.description: Starting value of the index that is to be fetched from fdTariffToInfo array.

parameterDecorators.name: _count
parameterDecorators.description: Number of tariff that is to be fetched from fdTariffToInfo array. In order to fetch entire array, set count to zero or a number higher than the last index of the array.

functionDecorators.name: getLoanDurationAndInterest
functionDecorators.description: Get all loan durations and their interest rates. Get all loan durations and their interest rates.

parameterDecorators.name: _cursor
parameterDecorators.description: Starting value of the index that is to be fetched from lnTariffToInfo array.

parameterDecorators.name: _count
parameterDecorators.description: Number of tariff that is to be fetched from lnTariffToInfo array. In order to fetch entire array, set count to zero or a number higher than the last index of the array.

functionDecorators.name: getUserDepositDetails
functionDecorators.description: Get the deposit details of an user. Get the deposit details of an user.

functionDecorators.name: getUserFdDetails
functionDecorators.description: Get the fixed deposit details of an user. Get the fixed deposit details of an user.

parameterDecorators.name: _cursor
parameterDecorators.description: Starting value of the index that is to be fetched from user's fdInfo array.

parameterDecorators.name: _count
parameterDecorators.description: Number of fd status that is to be fetched from user's fdInfo array. In order to fetch entire array, set count to zero or a number higher than the last index of the array.

functionDecorators.name: getUserLoanDetails
functionDecorators.description: Get the loan details of an user. Get the loan details of an user.

parameterDecorators.name: _cursor
parameterDecorators.description: Starting value of the index that is to be fetched from user's loanInfo array.

parameterDecorators.name: _count
parameterDecorators.description: Number of loan status that is to be fetched from user's loanInfo array. In order to fetch entire array, set count to zero or a number higher than the last index of the array.

functionDecorators.name: increaseReserveBalance
functionDecorators.description: Owner can increase the reserve balance that is to be maintained in the contract. Owner increase the reserveBalance.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount that is to be increased.

returnDecorators.description: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: ownerWithdraw
functionDecorators.description: Owner can withdraws profit. Owner withdraws profit.

functionDecorators.name: pauseNewDeposits
functionDecorators.description: Prevent new deposits. Prevent new deposits.

functionDecorators.name: pauseNewLoans
functionDecorators.description: Prevent new loans. Prevent new loans.

functionDecorators.name: removeFDDurationAndInterest
functionDecorators.description: Owner can remove a fixed deposit duration and its interest rate. Owner remove a fixed deposit duration and its interest rate.

functionDecorators.name: removeLoanDurationAndInterest
functionDecorators.description: Owner can remove a loan duration and its interest rate. Owner remove a loan duration and its interest rate.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore. Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: repayLoan
functionDecorators.description: Repay loan partially or completely. User repays the loan.

functionDecorators.name: requestLoan
functionDecorators.description: Request for a loan. User requests for a loan.

functionDecorators.name: resumeNewDeposits
functionDecorators.description: Allow new deposits. Allow new deposits.

functionDecorators.name: resumeNewLoans
functionDecorators.description: Allow new loans. Allow new loans.

functionDecorators.name: setFDDurationAndInterest
functionDecorators.description: Owner sets fixed deposit duration and its interest rate. Owner sets fixed deposit duration and its interest rate.

functionDecorators.name: setLoanDurationAndInterest
functionDecorators.description: Set a loan duration and its interest rate. Owner sets a loan duration and its interest rate.

functionDecorators.name: setManager
functionDecorators.description: Owner can change the manager. Owner changes the manager.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

functionDecorators.name: viewLoanRequests
functionDecorators.description: View loan requests. Manager can view all loan requests waiting for approval.

parameterDecorators.name: _cursor
parameterDecorators.description: Starting value of the index that is to be fetched from loanIdsOfPendingRequests array.

parameterDecorators.name: _count
parameterDecorators.description: Number of loan requests that is to be fetched from the array. In order to fetch entire array, set count to zero or a number higher than the last index of the array.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw an amount from account. User withdraw from his/her account.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFD
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw fixed deposit. User withdraws his/her fixed deposit with interest.

parameterDecorators.name: _fdIndex
parameterDecorators.description: Index of the Fixed deposit to be withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFDBeforeMaturity
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw fixed deposit before maturity period. User withdraws his/her fixed deposit before maturity period with penality of 5 percent of the FD Interest.

parameterDecorators.name: _fdIndex
parameterDecorators.description: Index of the Fixed deposit to be withdrawn.
